meanings: 대화 도중 That's what it was.
대화 도중 That explains it all.
감정 That's the way it goes.

meanings.meaning: that's the way the cookie crumbles

examples.korean: I did it for a bet. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 내기 때문에 그런 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I did it for a bet. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don’t get upset—I was only teasing. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 화내지 마. 그냥 장난으로 그런 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t get upset—I was only teasing. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: No way am I doing that. You must be joking! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 그런 거 절대 아냐. 농담하는 거니! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: No way am I doing that. You must be joking! Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He smiled and I smiled back. As you do. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그가 웃으니까 나도 웃어 준 거지. 그런 거 있잖아. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He smiled and I smiled back. As you do. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: ‘I didn’t do it!’ she broke in. 듣기 Add to Wordbook “내가 그런 거 아냐!” 그녀가 불쑥 끼어들며 말했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: ‘I didn’t do it!’ she broke in. Add to Wordbook
